text: Robert Gillmor MBE (6 July 1936 â€“ 8 May 2022) was a British ornithologist, artist, illustrator, author and editor. He was a founder member of the Society of Wildlife Artists (SWLA). He was the society's chairman and president. He worked on over 100 books, and in 2001 was honored with the RSPB Medal. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2022 deaths Category:British illustrators Category:People from Reading, Berkshire
title: Robert Gillmor
